Class HTTPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • projects.THU.jukify.HTTPClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, HTTPClientInterface

    public class HTTPClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, HTTPClientInterface
    Class responsible for HTTP Volley connection
